<i class="fa fa-folder"></i>[Kaggle dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/kriegsmaschine/soccer-players-values-and-their-statistics?select=transfermarkt_fbref_201819.csv)
 
-  Data was downloaded from Kaggle. The utilized dataset included data from transfermarkt.de and fbref.com for 2018/19 season merged by Rafael Stepien.
 
<i class="fa fa-wrench"></i>[Countries names](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/datasets/country-codes/master/data/country-codes.csv) 

- Countries names were acquired from github <i class="fa fa-github"></i>. This dataset included countries' names as well as their abbreviation, allowing us to connect it with the main dataset.
 
<i class="fa fa-globe"></i>[World coordinates](https://public.opendatasoft.com/explore/dataset/world-administrative-boundaries/export/) 

- Map coordinates for each country were downloaded from opendatasoft. Dataset was merged with the main dataset by the countries' names.
